name: Jank - Sandbox Game
description:
Jank is a sandbox/roleplaying game full of random things. I am willing to add anything as long as it's appropriate.  

Dev Note : The game is currently being brought back in due to certain problems with the multiplayer functionality, thanks for your concern.
